title: An inspired 10-year-old Macaulay Culkin in 1990's 'Home - Daily World
text:
'Home Alone': Still a scream 25 years later Macaulay Culkin's famous shriek will return to theaters where the movie ruled in 1990. Check out this story on dailyworld.com: http://usat.ly/1LelZM1 Macaulay Culkin feels the shaving lotion burn in an image that would come to represent 'Home Alone,' now celebrating its 25th anniversary.
Start the conversation, or Read more at Daily World.
